channel.title: Deep Learning on SBMARUF
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on SBMARUF

item.title: Malay-English Neural Machine Translation System.
item.description: This is a tool to translate an English sentence into Malay and vice versa. Developing a translation tool for low-resource languages like Malay has always been a challenge. The main challenge comes from the fact that machine translation systems typically rely on a huge amount of sentence-parallel data, and creating such datasets is an expensive process. In our work, we collected parallel datasets from various sources including News, OpenSubtitiles (OPUS), Ted talks, and Youtube video.
